00025     initFields(2);

00039 void BlobWriter::reset()
00040 {
00041     m_strErrMsg = "";
00042     m_strBlobFile = "";
00043     m_strIndexFile = "";
00044     m_strBatchDataDir = BAT_AXIOMDATA_DIR;
00045     
00046     m_fileHandle = NULL;
00047     m_iFileSize = 0;
00048     m_iFilePosition = 0;
00049     m_eOpenMode = OPENMODE_NONE;
00050     m_bOpen = false;
00051     m_iWrittenSampleBlocks = 0;
00052     m_iWrittenNumAlleles = 0;
00053 
00054     resetBuffer();
00055     m_blobReader.reset();
00056     m_indexWriter.reset();
00057 }

00059 void BlobWriter::resetBuffer()
00060 {
00061     m_szBuffer[0] = '\0';
00062     m_iBufferLength = 0;
00063     m_iBufferPosition = 0;
00064     m_bEndOfFile = false;
00065 }

00067 bool BlobWriter::initFolder(string strPackageFolder)
00068 {
00069     clearErrMsg();
00070 
00071     try {
00072         //if (!Fs::dirExists(strPackageFolder)) {
00073         //    setErrMsg("Failed to initialize blob writer, package folder does not exist.\tFolder: " + strPackageFolder);
00074         //    return false;
00075         //}
00076 
00077         Fs::ensureWriteableDirPath(Fs::join(strPackageFolder, getBatchDataDir()));
00078         setBlobFile(Fs::join(strPackageFolder, getBatchDataDir(), sBAT_BLOB_FILE));
00079         setIndexFile(Fs::join(strPackageFolder, getBatchDataDir(), sBAT_BLOB_INDEX_FILE));
00080     }
00081     catch (...) {
00082         setErrMsg("Unknown exception occurred while initialize folder for blob readerFailed to initialize blob writer, package folder does not exist.\tFolder: " + strPackageFolder);
00083         return false;
00084     }
00085 
00086     return true;
00087 }

00089 bool BlobWriter::init(string strBlobFile, string strIndexFile)
00090 {
00091     if (strIndexFile == "") {
00092         strIndexFile = Fs::join(Fs::dirname(strBlobFile), sBAT_BLOB_INDEX_FILE);
00093     }
00094 
00095     setBlobFile(strBlobFile);
00096     setIndexFile(strIndexFile);
00097 
00098     return true;
00099 }

00101 bool BlobWriter::open()
00102 {
00103     return open(getBlobFile(), getIndexFile());

00105 
00106 bool BlobWriter::open(string strBlobFile, string strIndexFile)
00107 {
00108     clearErrMsg();
00109 
00110     try {
00111         setOpen(false);
00112 
00113         if (Fs::fileExists(strBlobFile)) {
00114             setOpenMode(OPENMODE_UPDATE);
00115             setFilePosition(0);
00116             m_fileHandle = fopen(strBlobFile.c_str(), "r+b"); // update blob file
00117             if (!m_fileHandle) {
00118                 setErrMsg("Failed to open blob file for updating, file i/o error.\tBlobFile: " + strBlobFile);
00119                 return false;
00120             }
00121             if (!Fs::fileExists(strIndexFile)) {
00122                 setErrMsg("Failed to open blob writer, index file does not exist.\tIndexFile: " + strIndexFile);
00123                 return false;
00124             }
00125 
00126             // parse index file            
00127             if (!m_indexWriter.open(strIndexFile)) {
00128                 setErrMsg(m_indexWriter.getErrMsg());
00129                 return false;
00130             }
00131         }
00132         else {
00133             setOpenMode(OPENMODE_CREATE);
00134             setFilePosition(0);
00135             m_fileHandle = fopen(strBlobFile.c_str(), "w+b"); // create blob file
00136             if (!m_fileHandle) {
00137                 setErrMsg("Failed to open blob file for writing, file i/o error.\tBlobFile: " + strBlobFile);
00138                 return false;
00139             }
00140         }
00141     }
00142     catch (...) {
00143         setErrMsg("Exception occurred while opening blob writer for processing.\tBlobFile: " + strBlobFile + ", IndexFile: " + strIndexFile);
00144         return false;
00145     }
00146 
00147     // blob file is opened
00148     setOpen(true);
00149 
00150     return true;
00151 }
00152 
00153 bool BlobWriter::close()
00154 {
00155     bool bSuccessful = true;
00156     __int64 blobFileSize = 0;
00157 
00158     clearErrMsg();
00159 
00160     try {
00161         if (isOpen()) {
00162             // close blob file handle
00163             if (m_fileHandle != NULL) {
00164                 fclose(m_fileHandle);
00165                 m_fileHandle = NULL;
00166             }
00167 
00168             blobFileSize = Fs::fileSize(getBlobFile());
00169             if (blobFileSize != getExpectedFileSize()) {
00170                 setErrMsg("Blob file size is not consistent with expected size, blob may be corrupted.\tFileSize: " + Convert::toString((size_t)blobFileSize) + " (expected: " + Convert::toString((size_t)getExpectedFileSize()) + ")" + ", ExpectedSampleBlocks: " + Convert::toString((size_t)getExpectedSampleBlocks()) + ", WrittenNumAlleles: " + Convert::toString((size_t)getWrittenNumAlleles()));
00171                 bSuccessful = false;
00172             }
00173             if (getFilePosition() != getExpectedFileSize()) {
00174                 setErrMsg("Blob file position is not consistent with expected size, blob may be corrupted.\tFilePosition: " + Convert::toString((size_t)getFilePosition()) + " (expected: " + Convert::toString((size_t)getExpectedFileSize()) + ")" + ", ExpectedSampleBlocks: " + Convert::toString((size_t)getExpectedSampleBlocks()) + ", WrittenNumAlleles: " + Convert::toString((size_t)getWrittenNumAlleles()));
00175                 bSuccessful = false;
00176             }
00177             if (getWrittenSampleBlocks() != getExpectedSampleBlocks()) {
00178                 setErrMsg("Incorrect # of sample blocks written to blob file, blob may be corrupted.\tWritten: " + Convert::toString((size_t)getWrittenSampleBlocks()) + " (expected: " + Convert::toString((size_t)getExpectedSampleBlocks()) + ")" + ", NumProbeSets: " + Convert::toString(getNumProbeSets()) + ", NumSamples: " + Convert::toString(getNumSamples()));
00179                 bSuccessful = false;
00180             }
00181 
00182             // create index file
00183             if (!m_indexWriter.createFile(getIndexFile())) {
00184                 setErrMsg(m_indexWriter.getErrMsg());
00185                 bSuccessful = false;
00186             }
00187 
00188             setOpen(false);
00189         }
00190         else {
00191             blobFileSize = Fs::fileSize(getBlobFile());
00192         }
00193 
00194         if (bSuccessful) {
00195             reset();
00196             setFileSize(blobFileSize);
00197         }
00198     }
00199     catch (...) {
00200         setErrMsg("Exception occurred while closing blob writer.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile() + ", IndexFile: " + getIndexFile());
00201         return false;
00202     }
00203 
00204     return bSuccessful;
00205 }

00207 bool BlobWriter::write(const char* szData, size_t numBytes)
00208 {
00209     clearErrMsg();
00210 
00211     try {
00212         if (!isOpen()) {
00213             setErrMsg("Failed to write data to stream, writer not opened.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile() + ", IndexFile: " + getIndexFile());
00214             return false;
00215         }
00216 
00217         if (m_fileHandle == NULL) {
00218             setErrMsg("Failed to write data to stream, file handle is invalid.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile() + ", NumBytes: " + Convert::toString(numBytes));
00219             return false;
00220         }
00221 
00222         size_t bytesWritten = fwrite(szData, 1, numBytes, m_fileHandle);
00223         if (bytesWritten != numBytes) {
00224             setErrMsg("Failed to write data to blob file, file i/o error.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile() + ", NumBytes: " + Convert::toString(numBytes));
00225             return false;
00226         }
00227 
00228         incrementFilePosition(numBytes);
00229     }
00230     catch (...) {
00231         setErrMsg("Exception occurred while writing data to stream.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile() + ", NumBytes: " + Convert::toString(numBytes));
00232         return false;
00233     }
00234 
00235     return true;
00236 }

00243 bool BlobWriter::writeLine(string line)

00249 bool BlobWriter::writeBuffer(const char* szData, int numBytes)
00250 {
00251     clearErrMsg();
00252 
00253     try {
00254         if (!isOpen()) {
00255             setErrMsg("Failed to write data to buffer, writer not opened.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile() + ", IndexFile: " + getIndexFile());
00256             return false;
00257         }
00258 
00259         int finalPosition = m_iBufferPosition + numBytes;
00260         if (finalPosition < MAX_BUFFER) {
00261             // transfer data to buffer
00262             memcpy(&m_szBuffer[m_iBufferPosition], szData, numBytes);
00263             incrementBufferPosition(numBytes);
00264             incrementFilePosition(numBytes);
00265         }
00266         else {
00267             // flush buffer data to blob file
00268             int bytesOverflow = finalPosition - MAX_BUFFER;
00269             int bytesToCopy = numBytes - bytesOverflow;
00270             memcpy(&m_szBuffer[m_iBufferPosition], szData, bytesToCopy);
00271             size_t bytesWritten = fwrite(m_szBuffer, 1, MAX_BUFFER, m_fileHandle);
00272             if (bytesWritten != MAX_BUFFER) {
00273                 setErrMsg("Failed to flush buffer to blob file, file i/o error.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile());
00274                 return false;
00275             }
00276 
00277             // reset buffer and copy overflow bytes over
00278             resetBuffer();
00279             memcpy(&m_szBuffer[m_iBufferPosition], &szData[bytesToCopy], bytesOverflow);
00280             incrementBufferPosition(bytesOverflow);
00281             incrementFilePosition(bytesOverflow);
00282         }
00283     }
00284     catch (...) {
00285         setErrMsg("Exception occurred while writing data to buffer.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile());
00286         return false;
00287     }
00288 
00289     return true;
00290 }

00303 bool BlobWriter::flushBuffer()
00304 {
00305     clearErrMsg();
00306 
00307     try {
00308         if (!isOpen()) {
00309             setErrMsg("Failed to flush buffer to stream, writer not opened.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile() + ", IndexFile: " + getIndexFile());
00310             return false;
00311         }
00312 
00313         // flush buffer data to blob file
00314         if (m_iBufferPosition > 0) {
00315             size_t bytesWritten = fwrite(m_szBuffer, 1, m_iBufferPosition, m_fileHandle);
00316             if (bytesWritten != m_iBufferPosition) {
00317                 setErrMsg("Failed to flush buffer to blob file, file i/o error.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile());
00318                 return false;
00319             }
00320 
00321             // reset buffer
00322             resetBuffer();
00323         }
00324     }
00325     catch (...) {
00326         setErrMsg("Exception occurred while flushing buffer to blob file.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile());
00327         return false;
00328     }
00329 
00330     return true;
00331 }

00333 size_t BlobWriter::getCurrentFilePosition()
00334 {
00335     clearErrMsg();
00336 
00337     if (!isOpen()) {
00338         setErrMsg("Failed to get blob current position, writer not opened.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile());
00339         return -1;
00340     }
00341 
00342     if (m_fileHandle == NULL) {
00343         setErrMsg("Failed to get blob current position, file handle is invalid.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile());
00344         return -1;
00345     }
00346 
00347     size_t position = -1;
00348 
00349 #ifdef WIN32
00350     position = _ftelli64(m_fileHandle);
00351 #else
00352     position = ftello64(m_fileHandle);
00353 #endif
00354 
00355     return position;
00356 }

00358 bool BlobWriter::seek(size_t fileOffset)
00359 {
00360     clearErrMsg();
00361 
00362     if (!isOpen()) {
00363         setErrMsg("Failed to seek to blob offset, writer not opened.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile());
00364         return false;
00365     }
00366 
00367     if (!isOpenModeUpdate()) {
00368         setErrMsg("Failed to seek to blob offset, not in update mode.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile());
00369         return false;
00370     }
00371 
00372     if (m_fileHandle == NULL) {
00373         setErrMsg("Failed to seek to blob offset, file handle is invalid.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile());
00374         return false;
00375     }
00376 
00377     int result = 0;
00378 
00379 #ifdef WIN32
00380     result = _fseeki64(m_fileHandle, fileOffset, SEEK_SET);
00381 #else
00382     result = fseeko64(m_fileHandle, fileOffset, SEEK_SET);
00383 #endif
00384 
00385     setFilePosition(fileOffset);
00386 
00387     return (result == 0);
00388 }

00395 bool BlobWriter::seekToProbeSet(string strProbeSetId)
00396 {
00397     clearErrMsg();
00398 
00399     IndexTable& indexTable = m_indexWriter.getIndexTable();
00400     IndexTable::iterator iterFind = indexTable.find(strProbeSetId);
00401     if (iterFind == indexTable.end()) {
00402         setErrMsg("Failed to seek to blob probeset, probeset id not found.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile() + ", IndexFile: " + getIndexFile() + ", ProbeSetId: " + strProbeSetId);
00403         return false;
00404     }
00405 
00406     return seek(iterFind->getFileOffset());
00407 }

00409 bool BlobWriter::seekToSample(string strProbeSetId, string strSampleName)
00410 {
00411     clearErrMsg();
00412 
00413     IndexHeader& indexHeader = m_indexWriter.getIndexHeader();
00414     int sampleIndex = indexHeader.findSampleIndex(strSampleName);
00415     if (sampleIndex == -1) {
00416         setErrMsg("Failed to seek to blob sample, sample name not found.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile() + ", IndexFile: " + getIndexFile() + ", ProbeSetId: " + strProbeSetId + ", SampleName: " + strSampleName);
00417         return false;
00418     }
00419 
00420     IndexTable& indexTable = m_indexWriter.getIndexTable();
00421     IndexTable::iterator iterFind = indexTable.find(strProbeSetId);
00422     if (iterFind == indexTable.end()) {
00423         setErrMsg("Failed to seek to blob sample, probeset id not found.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile() + ", IndexFile: " + getIndexFile() + ", ProbeSetId: " + strProbeSetId);
00424         return false;
00425     }
00426 
00427     size_t probeSetOffset = iterFind->getFileOffset();
00428     size_t sampleOffset = sampleIndex * indexHeader.getBytesPerSample(iterFind->getNumAlleles());
00429 
00430     return seek(probeSetOffset + sampleOffset);
00431 }

00433 bool BlobWriter::skipToNextSample(int numAlleles, int numSamples)
00434 {
00435     clearErrMsg();
00436 
00437     if (!isOpen()) {
00438         setErrMsg("Failed to skip to next sample, writer not opened.\tBlobReader: " + getBlobFile() + ", IndexFile: " + getIndexFile());
00439         return false;
00440     }
00441 
00442     if (!isOpenModeUpdate()) {
00443         setErrMsg("Failed to skip to next sample, not in update mode.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile());
00444         return false;
00445     }
00446 
00447     if (m_fileHandle == NULL) {
00448         setErrMsg("Failed to skip to next sample, file handle is invalid.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile());
00449         return false;
00450     }
00451 
00452     IndexHeader& indexHeader = m_indexWriter.getIndexHeader();
00453     int bytesPerSample = numSamples * indexHeader.getBytesPerSample(numAlleles);
00454     int result = 0;
00455 
00456 #ifdef WIN32
00457     result = _fseeki64(m_fileHandle, bytesPerSample, SEEK_CUR);
00458 #else
00459     result = fseeko64(m_fileHandle, bytesPerSample, SEEK_CUR);
00460 #endif
00461 
00462     return (result == 0);
00463 }

00497 bool BlobWriter::writeSample(SampleEx& sample)
00498 {
00499     clearErrMsg();
00500 
00501     char szData[MAX_BUFFER];
00502     int sampleMultiplier = getSampleMultiplier();
00503     size_t numBytes = sample.format(szData, sampleMultiplier);
00504     if (numBytes == -1) {
00505         setErrMsg("Failed to format data for next sample, data format error.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile());
00506         return false;
00507     }
00508 
00509     if (!write(szData, numBytes)) {
00510         setErrMsg("Failed to write data for next sample, file i/o error.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile() + ", NumBytes: " + Convert::toString(numBytes));
00511         return false;
00512     }
00513 
00514     incrementWrittenSampleBlocks(sampleMultiplier);
00515     incrementWrittenNumAlleles(sample.getNumAlleles() * sampleMultiplier);
00516 
00517     return true;
00518 }
00519 
00520 bool BlobWriter::writeSampleBlock(SampleList& vSamples)
00521 {
00522     clearErrMsg();
00523 
00524     char szData[MAX_BUFFER];
00525     int sampleMultiplier = getSampleMultiplier();
00526     size_t numBytes = vSamples.formatBlock(szData, sampleMultiplier);
00527     if (numBytes == -1) {
00528         setErrMsg("Failed to format data for next sample block, data format error.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile());
00529         return false;
00530     }
00531 
00532     if (!write(szData, numBytes)) {
00533         setErrMsg("Failed to write data for next sample block, file i/o error.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile() + ", NumBytes: " + Convert::toString(numBytes));
00534         return false;
00535     }
00536 
00537     __int64 numAlleles = 0;
00538     for (int i = 0; i < (int)vSamples.size(); i++) {
00539         numAlleles += vSamples[i].getNumAlleles();
00540     }
00541 
00542     incrementWrittenSampleBlocks(vSamples.size() * sampleMultiplier);
00543     incrementWrittenNumAlleles(numAlleles * sampleMultiplier);
00544 
00545     return true;
00546 }
00547 
00548 bool BlobWriter::writeNextSample(SampleEx& sample)
00549 {
00550     clearErrMsg();
00551 
00552     if (!isOpenModeUpdate()) {
00553         setErrMsg("Failed to write data for next sample, not in update mode.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile());
00554         return false;
00555     }
00556 
00557     IndexHeader& indexHeader = m_indexWriter.getIndexHeader();
00558     size_t bytesPerSample = indexHeader.getBytesPerSample(sample.getNumAlleles());
00559     size_t currentFilePosition = getCurrentFilePosition();
00560     size_t fileSize = getFileSize();
00561 
00562     if (currentFilePosition + bytesPerSample > fileSize) {
00563         setErrMsg("Failed to write data for next sample, bytes exceeded stream size.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile() + ", RemainingBytes: " + Convert::toString(fileSize - currentFilePosition) + ", Expected: " + Convert::toString(bytesPerSample));
00564         return false;
00565     }
00566 
00567     return writeSample(sample);
00568 }
00569 
00570 bool BlobWriter::writeNextSampleBlock(SampleList& vSamples)
00571 {
00572     clearErrMsg();
00573 
00574     if (!isOpenModeUpdate()) {
00575         setErrMsg("Failed to write data for next sample block, not in update mode.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile());
00576         return false;
00577     }
00578 
00579     IndexHeader& indexHeader = m_indexWriter.getIndexHeader();
00580     int bytesPerSampleBlock = indexHeader.getBytesPerSampleBlock(vSamples);
00581     size_t currentFilePosition = getCurrentFilePosition();
00582     size_t fileSize = getFileSize();
00583 
00584     if (currentFilePosition + bytesPerSampleBlock > fileSize) {
00585         setErrMsg("Failed to write data for next sample block, bytes exceeded stream size.\tBlobFile: " + getBlobFile() + ", RemainingBytes: " + Convert::toString(fileSize - currentFilePosition) + ", Expected: " + Convert::toString(bytesPerSampleBlock));
00586         return false;
00587     }
00588 
00589     return writeSampleBlock(vSamples);
00590 }
